generated_description:
Curatle is shaking up the e-commerce world in a smart way. Launched in 2023 and nestled in Irvine, CA, this innovative startup operates as an AI product search engine. It began its journey by helping users discover products through genuine recommendations from real people, gathering links and prices from various e-commerce platforms‚Äîall designed to save you time and effort.

As part of Y Combinator's Summer 2023 batch, Curatle is grabbing attention with a straightforward mission: make product discovery easier and more reliable. That's not just marketing speak; they deliver tangible solutions. Think of it as your personal shopping assistant that compiles the best options available online based on user insights.

At its core, Curatle caters to a range of shopping needs through interactive features designed to engage users. You can search for anything‚Äîfrom the best mineral sunscreen to custom keyboards‚Äîwhile benefiting from access to price matching and a unique product builder that lets you create your ideal setups across categories like skincare and gaming PCs. 

Despite having a lean team of just one, Curatle is under the guidance of Group Partner Aaron Epstein, signaling a commitment to quality and growth. The company is tagged with important themes like artificial intelligence, consumer goods, and search technologies, making it part of a rapidly evolving marketplace.

So, if you‚Äôre in the market for something specific or just curious about what‚Äôs out there, Curatle is geared to help you nail down the best options with ease. Check it out at [Curatle.com](https://curatle.com) and see what all the fuss is about!
